name: musicMove_1.1
description:
An updated version of the initially submitted musicMove for GMTK jam 2019

https://fakemaxxe.itch.io/musicmove

Changes:

- added linux & mac versions // removed again, seemed broken on linux

- better jump

-faster max speed

- added "player is stuck" detection

- changed manual reset, by pressing "R", to current position rather than the beginning of the level

- added "Q" button for a reset to start of the level

- changed base blocks

- tweaked enemy spawn & behaviour

- being touched by an enemy sets you back a bit rather than being reset to the beginning

- more enemies will spawn in proximity of the player

-fixed audio problems
